title: Scenario 3: Spread the Net
special:
Mark two rectangular zones (6" Ã— 12") and one circular zone (12" diameter) and place two flags in accordance with the diagram below. Starting on the second player's second turn, at the end of each player's turn, a player earns control points (CP) as follows:

  • Zone: Control = 1 CP
  • Enemy Flag: Control = 1 CP
  • Flag:Control = 1 CP
